scripts.serve: f yarn gen_config && yarn franklin_lib_upgrade && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.build: f yarn gen_config && yarn franklin_lib_upgrade && vue-cli-service build
scripts.franklin_lib_upgrade: cd ../franklin_lib && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn upgrade franklin_lib
scripts.set_token_name: psql --host=localhost --user=postgres --dbname=plasma --command="update tokens set symbol='FAU' where id=1"
